mdRecord.dcterms:description: (Blurry picture) Deathly Hallows symbol from Harry Potter. Possible reference to UVA Basketball championship victory of 2019. One graffiti suggests reader listen to a song, "Terrapin" by Bonobo; another responds with approval. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
NATTY CHAMPS 2019! | Bonobo - Terrapin (go listen) ‚Üê Yes!
